projects.description: Led the team responsible for developing a system application to test Lamarr devices.
projects.title: Lamarr (TCI6630K2L and 66AK2L06) validation and bring up
Lamarr (TCI6630K2L) electrical characterization and documentation for release to market

projects.description: Analyzed the required feasibility and scope, then designed and implemented a requirements management tool for the wireless base station business unit. This involved identifying the least expensive tool and implementing the requirements pool structure and reporting mechanism in just a few months.
projects.title: Requirements management tool

projects.description:
Led the team that designed and implemented this device hibernation software package in just one month. This allowed the customer to go into device hibernation at night when traffic was low.

The package saved the customer more than 30 percent in power, for six hours each day, for each device on the board.
projects.title: Hibernation implementation for Turbo Nyquist (TCI6618 and C6670) devices

projects.description: Defined and executed power optimization development for IWR1443 devices to bring the power down from 474mW to 20mW to enable these devices operating with 4-20mA loop cable.
projects.title: IWR1443 power optimization for level sensing market.

educations.schoolName: Gujarat Law Society Institute of Technology

headline: Industrial Marketing Manager at Texas Instruments | Business & Marketing Director at ScanON LLC
